mapper.select: SELECT main_order_number, pay_time, status_id, deliver_type_title, is_seller_order, user_id, username, diy_site_code, seller_real_name, seller_username, real_user_real_name, real_user_username, remark, city, paper_sales_number FROM td_order_copy WHERE main_order_number = #{mainOrderNumber} GROUP BY main_order_number
